spec_data.Name: perl-JSON
spec_data.Description:
This module converts between JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) and Perl
data structure into each other. For JSON, see http://www.crockford.com/JSON/.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:34:24 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Parse and convert to JSON (JavaScript Object Notation)
